description:
Set in a slightly futuristic world where Earth has been invaded and is at war with aliens from another dimension called the Nova, the story follows the adventures of a Japanese boy named Kazuya Aoi who enrolls for training at a special school for genetically modified girls called Pandoras who battle the aliens, and their male partners, called Limiters, who use a special power called "freezing" to limit their opponent's mobility. The protagonist makes the acquaintance of an unusual older girl named Satellizer el Bridget who appears to be the most powerful Pandora in her class, but has not yet chosen a male partner to be her Limiter, and in spite of the warnings of all his friends, he decides to be her Limiter.

(Source: Wikipedia)

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

node.description:
Kouji Tsujitani was a Japanese actor, voice actor, narrator, and director of audiography. Tsujitani used to be affiliated with Sigma Seven. He died of a stroke on October 17, 2018.

He was married to fellow voice actress [Kumiko Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/95248/).

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/TkashiWatanabe)

Joined Top Craft as an animator while still attending university, switched his focus to directing in the late '80s.

Married to [Miyata Naomi](https://anilist.co/staff/220081/).

__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

[Artist Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/masaruyokoyama) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masaruyokoyama)

**Yokoyama Masaru** is a Japanese composer, arranger, keyboardist and programmer affiliated with Miracle Bus.

Currently freelance he resides in Tokyo. Yoshioka is a member of the Writers' Guild of Japan and the Television and Radio Writers' Association of Japan.

[Website](http://www.takawo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/takawoy) | [Twitter 2](https://twitter.com/takawoyy)
In March 2010, she graduated from Tokyo Animation College.

[Website](https://kobayashiaika.jp/s/n85/?ima=2313) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aikyan_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kyanstagram_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNG7L36HtofjQk0FduxLxpw)

She's good at dancing. Her father is Japanese, while her mother is half Japanese and Korean. She learned ballet at the age of 5 and hip hop at third year of elementary school.

In 2011, she debuted as a singer for TV anime [Freezing](https://anilist.co/anime/9367/Freezing/) ending theme, "Kimi o Mamoritai" (君を守りたい) and was released as a split single with its opening theme. In 2012, she released a single for TV anime [Queen's Blade Rebellion](https://anilist.co/anime/11859/Queens-Blade-Rebellion/) ending theme, "Future is Serious". Both singles are released under Media Factory's record labels.

In 2015, she debuted as a voice actress with [Love Live! Sunshine!!](https://anilist.co/anime/21584/Love-Live-Sunshine/) as [Yoshiko Tsushima](https://anilist.co/character/89849/Yoshiko-Tsushima). She belongs to the idol group Aqours and its sub unit Guilty Kiss along with Rikako Aida and Aina Suzuki. She is nicknamed "Aikyan" by both fans and Aqours members.

In November 2016, she was announced to be one of the permanent hosts in Love Live! Sunshine!!'s radio program along with Anju Inami and Arisa Komiya.

Designed [her own parka](https://vvstore.jp/feature/detail/12383/).

__[Website (pliom)](http://pliom.com/)__

__Toku__ (also known by his full name Yoshinori Abe) is a Japanese sound producer, arranger, composer and member of the pliom, and the duo [GARNiDELiA](https://anilist.co/staff/120052/GARNiDELiA). He is known for his sound producing work for artists such as [LiSA](https://anilist.co/staff/105561/LiSA), [Angela Aki](https://anilist.co/staff/101394/Angela-Aki) and [Antic Cafe](https://anilist.co/staff/100972/An-Cafe).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/MARiA_GRND) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/MARiA_GRND/) | [Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/maria-grnd/) | [Biography (GARNiDELiA)](https://www.garnidelia.com/biography/)

__Introduction:__
Mai Mizuhashi, alternatively known by her stage name Maria (stylized as MARiA), is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, model and member of musical duo [GARNiDELiA](https://anilist.co/staff/120052/GARNiDELiA) alongside Toku ([Yoshinori Abe](https://anilist.co/staff/160034/Yoshinori-Abe)). She was formerly a member of the band Chix Chicks until their disbandment in July 27, 2010.

__[Website (pliom)](http://pliom.com/)__

__Toku__ (also known by his full name Yoshinori Abe) is a Japanese sound producer, arranger, composer and member of the pliom, and the duo [GARNiDELiA](https://anilist.co/staff/120052/GARNiDELiA). He is known for his sound producing work for artists such as [LiSA](https://anilist.co/staff/105561/LiSA), [Angela Aki](https://anilist.co/staff/101394/Angela-Aki) and [Antic Cafe](https://anilist.co/staff/100972/An-Cafe).

__Cousin:__ [Aaron Dismuke](https://anilist.co/staff/95254/Aaron-Dismuke)

__Justin Ryan Cook__ is an American voice actor, producer, line producer, ADR director and enginner who works for FUNimation.
Clint Bickham is an American voice actor and ADR script writer working with Funimation Entertainment/OkraTron 5000 and ADV Films/Seraphim Digital.
